cards.html:
For this week’s Switch Kickstarter Project of the Week, we will be looking at Little Legend. This game is an open world 2D action adventure game that has you rebuilding the universe.

Here’s their description:

Little Legend is a 2D side-scrolling adventure game taking place in a dreamlike open world. You play as Pimpim, a young girl with supernatural powers who sets off to explore the world. Craft your own magic abilities, explore a huge captivating world and discover the secret behind the rebuilding of the universe.

This project requires €30,600 and it is currently sitting at €20,989 from 277 backers with 23 days remaining. Little Legend is planning to be released on PC & Nintendo Switch in December 2020 and PS4 and Xbox One in 2021.

Click here to check out there Kickstarter page that has a tonne of concept art on there for you to see, and perhaps consider chucking a few € their way.

 

Does Little Legend interest you? Or is it a hard pass? Let us know in the Comments section below.
